bug.author: sunilkusahoo
bug.summary: ImportError: Dynamic module does not define module export function(PyInit_bz2)
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
I have setup python3 env and install streamlit . everything is working file even hello program is also running fine . but while i use run command wit my real program found below error . ImportError: Dynamic module does not define module export function(PyInit_bz2) not able to resolved , need help

comments.comment: I have reinstall all the env once again and update my Pandas library. post which issue resolved
